    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String itemName,
    java.lang.String itemDescription,
    java.lang.String itemLocationDescription,
    java.lang.String useText,
    boolean canAdd,
    boolean lockable,
    boolean locked)
        Create a new item
        Parameters:
        itemName - Name of the item
        itemDescription - Item description
        itemLocationDescription - Describes where the item is located, will display in EXAMINE ROOM - use NULL if this isn't desired
        useText - Text displayed when item is used
        canAdd - Can this item be added to the inventory or not
        lockable - Can this item be locked?
        locked - Locked
